Here's Everything You Need To Know About Priyanka Chopra & Nick Jonas' Chic Wedding Invitation
Here's Everything You Need To Know About Priyanka Chopra & Nick Jonas' Chic Wedding Invitation
Just when we got over with the biggest Bollywood wedding of Ranveer Singh and Deepika Padukone, there is another high profile one in the pipeline. Although DeepVeer will be hosting receptions for their friends and family in Bengaluru, preparations for the other mega couple have already begun.
We're talking about Priyanka Chopra and Nick Jonas, the power couple who is the talk of the town, globally as well. As per reports, the duo is all set to tie the knot on December 1 at a plush palace of Jodhpur.
The mother of the bride-to-be has been making visits and ensuring the arrangements are going on in full swing. Priyanka, on the other hand, is last minute shopping for her D-Day.
The actress was in Paris for a quick wedding shoe shopping and picking up macaroons for everyone to give along with her wedding card. Yes, PC's wedding card is doing the rounds as her friends and family are thanking and posting pictures of it.
Don't Miss 365 SHARES 161 SHARES 862 SHARES
Here's taking a look at the wonderful colour combination, Priyanka chose for her perfect day.
1. Farhan Akhtar is one of the first Bollywood celebrities to be invited. Priyanka is currently shooting The Sky Is Pink with him and decided to keep him at the top of the invitation list.
Instagram/Priyanka Chopra
2. When Shaadi ka laddoo comes straight from Paris to Chandni Chowk. The cast and crew are filming the movie in Old Delhi and keeping her international swag, she chose colourful buttery macaroons from Maison Laduree ahead of her wedding.
Instagram/Priyanka Chopra
3. Priyanka visited the Jimmy Choo Store in Paris to pick up the right pair of wedding shoes.
Instagram/Priyanka Chopra
4. Priyanka had visited Jodhpur early this year with fiance Nick Jonas and shortlist Umaid Bhawan as her wedding venue.
Twitter
Her functions will reportedly begin from 29th November and go on till December 1. Well, we can't wait to see Priyanka Chopra walk down the aisle in her traditional wedding attire.
